page.title: 08WATERSPORTS (IRVINE)
page.content: My name is Alan Black and my dad has been a member of Irvine Watersports Club for seven years. {Site-}Gottries Road near the Magnum and Harbour. {Cost-}Â£11 for an adult membership and Â£5.50 for a childs membership (under 16). Money is raised by the members by running dances and discos to pay for the upkeep of the club. 300 members in the following sections. the sea angling,fresh water angling, boat owner section, sailing,cruising and a sub-aqua section. My dad and I take part in the sea angling section which is Â£10 to hire a boat for a day which goes towards the petrol.The most common fish in these waters are cod and dab.
